name: Staplers!
description:
Staplers! is a quick puzzle game where you need to pin down two rotating spheres at the same time!

Timing is very valuable in this game because one little mistake can cost you your level. Plan it right, execute it right and you're good. Each level has a certain number of pins as well as a certain speed of the sphere rotation. That makes further levels harder than the ones at the beginning. Have a nice play!
